sources.title: Prairie Pals
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Prairie Pals (1942) BILL 'COWBOY RAMBLER' BOYD
sources.description:
Stars: Bill 'Cowboy Rambler' Boyd, Art Davis, Lee Powell 
Director: Sam Newfield

Three prairie pals bust up a gangster plot to make synthetic gold out of vanadium ore!

metadata.Plot: Shannon wants Hank Stoner's land for the vanadium ore it contains. He has chemist Wainwright, who can change the ore into gold, held prisoner. But the Frontier Marshals are on the job. Art and Bill have infiltrated the gang and are getting messages to Lee as to the gang's plans.
metadata.Actors: Bill 'Cowboy Rambler' Boyd, Art Davis, Lee Powell
